New Records: Cape Verde secured their first knockout victory at AFCON
Key Match Events: Ryan Mendes scored a late penalty to win the match
The match went into extra time
Cape Verde goalkeeper Vozinha made crucial saves
Mauritania had a missed chance just before the hour mark
Pre-Game Insights: Cape Verde had previously never won a knockout tie at AFCON
Post-Match Reflections: Cape Verde coach Pedro Brito expressed pride in the team's performance and set their target as reaching the semi-finals
Mauritania coach Amir Abdou regretted the loss and highlighted their positive run
Miscellaneous Highlights: Cape Verde's victory marked a significant milestone in their AFCON history
